message: Anything that has you wanting to drop everything that you’re doing now, just so that you can go create something new. Web links, images, ideas... you get the idea.
Although this is a Flash-based website, it does run amazingly silky-smooth: http://gallery.artofgregmartin.com/
What kinda sources are you looking for?
and of course, one of my favorites, Creature Box: http://creaturebox.com/
That’s the spirit! Great stuff, Kyle. Thanks!
also off the top of my head... http://notcot.org , http://fubiz.net , http://motionographer.com , http://cartoonbrew.com
Here's one I've been hitting hard lately: http://sebastian-kruger-news.blogspot.com/
OMG. This is like throwing gasoline on my creative fire! http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_ZdSjEry1Lo0/TRxaJ0zqGHI/AAAAAAAAAdg/A7fqjdkVUOo/s1600/keith_richards_ny.jpg
See?  Incredible.  His rendering of Willie Nelson is just as mind blowing.
Just got this one from Mr. Andy Rutledge: http://www.ufunk.net/en/illustration/12-illustrations-de-lunivers-tourmente-de-zerg118/
I use Google images daily or http://www.cooliris.com/
Here are a couple I like http://mediumphobic.com/#/artworks/ and http://www.flickr.com/photos/guymckinley
Just came across this one today via @smashmag http://www.emailinspiration.com/
